product description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3 is a powerful gaming laptop that offers great performance and a sleek design.
customer reviews: "I've been using this laptop for gaming for a few weeks now and it's been great. The graphics are amazing and the performance is top-notch."
specifications: Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H, Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Ti, Memory: 16GB DDR4 RAM, Storage: 512GB SSD, Display: 15.6" FHD IPS

product description: The Dell XPS 13 is a premium ultrabook that offers great performance and a stunning display.
customer reviews: "The Dell XPS 13 is hands down the best laptop I've ever owned. The build quality is excellent, the keyboard is great, and the display is simply stunning."
specifications: Processor: Intel Core i7-1165G7, Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics, Memory: 16GB LPDDR4x RAM, Storage: 512GB SSD, Display: 13.4" FHD+ Touchscreen

product description: The HP Pavilion 15 is a budget-friendly laptop that offers decent performance and a basic design.
customer reviews: "For the price, the HP Pavilion 15 is a great laptop. It's not the most powerful machine out there, but it gets the job done and it's perfect for everyday use."
specifications: Processor: Intel Core i5-1135G7, Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics, Memory: 8GB DDR4 RAM, Storage: 256GB SSD, Display: 15.6" FHD IPS
